summary: The Empowering Families in Special Education Act (H.R. 1570) aims to amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act. The bill mandates that local educational agencies notify parents of children with disabilities about the composition of the Individualized Education Program (IEP) team prior to the team's first meeting each school year. This notification informs parents of their right to include individuals with relevant knowledge or expertise, including related services personnel.
